description:
The ideal line for working big routes. Developed with help from Tommy Caldwell, it has a high sheath proportion (40%), so it's a workhorse option for heavy projecting, big walls, route development or any situation where your rope takes a beating. UIAA certified EcoDry treatment absorbs less than 2% of it's weight in water, so it stays light and is less susceptible to freezing in wet, cold conditions.

  • Duo Tec pattern change at halfway point makes it easy to find the middle
  • Thermo Shield treatment gives it excellent handling properties, a supple feel and an impressive strength rating
  • EcoDry finish makes this rope durably water-repellent and dirt-resistant without the use of PFCs
  • 3D lap coiled so you can use it straight away without kinking or tangling
  • Meets UIAA standard water-repellent test, meaning this rope is fast-drying, absorbs virtually no water and resists freezing
name: Edelrid Tommy Caldwell Eco Dry DuoTec 9.6mm Rope
